description: Frequently asked questions with expandable answers

settings.label: Subheading
settings.default: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

settings.label: Answer
settings.default: We offer a 30-day return policy on all items. Products must be unused and in their original packaging. Please contact our customer service team to initiate a return.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all items. Products must be unused and in their original packaging. Please contact our customer service team to initiate a return.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping options are available at checkout for faster delivery.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping times and costs vary by location.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information. You can also check your order status in your account dashboard.
